fields.headline: Towel origami
fields.bodyText: Once, fluffing your pillows would have been enough, but hotel housekeeping staff around the world seem to have got carried away and are twisting the towels into little origami shapes. At the Jumeirah Beach Hotel in Dubai, guests return to find a menagerie of elephants, swans and dragons, complete with stuck-on eyes, on their beds. If you're staying at the Hyatt Regency Taba Heights in Egypt, don't freak out if you spot a snake - it's just your beach towel twisted into a cobra. Reviewers on tripadvisor.com report recent sightings in hotels all over Mexico, and hotelchatter.com has spotted elephant- and human-shaped towels wearing sunglasses.
